= Configuration File Format (config.xml) =

The basic structure of RCBs config file looks like this:

{{{
<config>
	<RomCollections>
		<RomCollection>
			<!-- elements -->
		</RomCollection>
	</RomCollections>
	<FileTypes>
		<FileType>
			<!-- elements -->
		</FileType>
	</FileTypes>
	<ImagePlacing>
		<!-- elements -->
	</ImagePlacing>
	<Scrapers>
		<!-- elements -->
	</Scrapers>
</config>
}}}

Usually you should only get in contact with the `RomCollection` entries. If you have some special requirements and you know what you are doing you can of course change everything else.

Most settings have a default value. If you don't define a setting in config.xml, RCB will work with the default value.
